channel.title: Matrix.Corp News
channel.description: Matrix.Corp official news source updated by admins, providing in-depth group-wide announcements.

item.title: Digital ID Cards Commencing Distribution on 21/10/2025
item.description: Official Matrix.Corp Digital Identity Cards will be made available for download starting October 21st, 2025. These verifiable credentials are tied directly to your user profile and provide cryptographic proof of clearance.

item.title: Welcome to the Authoritative Matrix.Corp News Feed
item.description: This feed serves as the single, authoritative source for all critical Matrix.Corp announcements, utilizing the RSS standard for maximum syndication and accessibility across diverse client applications.
